app_descript:
Brief

Yuka is an innovative mobile app that empowers consumers by providing instant ratings and detailed information about food and cosmetic products through a simple barcode scan. Since its launch in 2017, Yuka has rapidly grown, now boasting over 30 million users and a vast product database. Supporting multiple languages and available on both Android and iOS, Yuka is shaping the way we understand product health implications and environmental impact.
